nlp.utils.weight_initialization module¶

nlp.utils.weight_initialization.he_normal_initialize(submodule)¶
nlp.utils.weight_initialization.he_uniform_initialize(submodule)¶
nlp.utils.weight_initialization.select_weight_initialize_method(method: str, distribution: str, model: Module) → None¶
Initialize weight method

  • weight initialization of choice [he, xavier]

  • weight distribution of choice [uniform, normal]

매개변수:

  • method (str) – weight initialization method

  • distribution – weight distribution

  • model – Transformer Model
